description: Complete analytics map for the super pass purchase journey.

flow.description: Purchase flow token emitted by `SuperPassPurchaseNavigationConstants`: `flowFreshPurchase`, `flowFreshPurchaseWithoutProofRequirement`, `flowPaymentPostVerification`, `flowReapplication`, `flowRenewPass`, or `flowPaymentModeChangedNoVerification`. Helps segment events by the branch that triggered them.

isSuperPass.description: Hard-coded `true` for every event in this flow to allow dashboards to filter the super pass event family.

productId.description: `configId` of the Super Pass configuration that the user is interacting with.

productType.description: Product type; these events always log `superPass`.

productSubType.description: Product sub-type (magicPass, ridePass, etc.) pulled from the configuration metadata.

passengerType.description: Passenger category identifier chosen in the fare configuration (e.g. Adult, Student).

noOfDays.description: Number of days covered by the selected product, serialized to string.

startDate.description: Formatted pass start date used by payment/proof events.

orderId.description: Backend order identifier returned by CreateSuperPassOrderUseCase.

chaloOrderId.description: Chalo-specific order id mirroring the backend order.

failureReason.description: Human-readable failure description when order creation or cash selection fails.

referenceId.description: Cash payment reference provided when MPASS_CASH_PAYMENT_OPTION_SELECTED succeeds or when the cash web page launches.

pendingFare.description: Pending fare that remains on cash payment flows.

productCity.description: City slug extracted from the BookableSuperPassConfiguration for cash payments.

productAgency.description: Agency name backing the selected pass configuration.

revisedPassStartDate.description: New start date chosen via the pass start date dialog.

oldPassStartDate.description: The previous start date before the change.

postponedByDays.description: Number of days the start date moved by.

agency.description: Agency name that failed to fulfil the purchase, emitted before navigating back home.

start destination.description: Label describing the first screen (confirmation, basic user details, smart passenger selection, user proofs overview, or not available).

smartPassengerList size.description: Count of passengers returned by the smart selection API.

isConvertedToRenewFlow.description: True when smart passenger selection triggers the renew conversion path.

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth formatted in medium form.

gender.description: Gender enum name from the user input.

mobileNumber.description: Mobile number tied to the selected passenger.

userId.description: Chalo user id carried with the passenger/proof metadata.

dobInMillis.description: Epoch millis representation of the date of birth.

isRejectedProofImage.description: Flag to differentiate rejected proof zoom states.

url.description: URLs for sample forms or tutorial videos.

isDismissed.description: True if the camera permission dialog was dismissed.

passStartDate.description: Start date reported from the user details screen.

coming from source.description: Source tag passed when the name-only screen is triggered (usually sourceSuperPassPurchaseFragment).

canActivate.description: True when activation is possible from the booking success screen.

source.description: Label for booking success events; always booking success screen.

productName.description: Human-friendly pass name surfaced to verification screens.

fareMappingId.description: Fare mapping identifier from the configuration.

problemSource.description: Source tag for report problem events (src_mPassPurchaseActivity).

categoryName.description: Category tab name selected in pass selection.

stages.name: Entry
stages.description: Shared component onboarding, actor verification, and initial routing.

stages.name: Confirm & payment
stages.description: User interacts with the confirmation screen, tweaks start date, hits pay, and the backend creates an order or returns cash instructions.
events: pass start date change CTA clicked
mPass confirm purchase pay btn clicked
open super pass cash payment web page

stages.name: User details & passenger selection
stages.description: Flows that collect personal data and passenger picks before proof upload.
events: superPass enter user name screen open
superPass enter user name next clicked

stages.name: Proof overview & upload
stages.description: Proof documentation reachability, sample downloads, uploads, and permission handling.

stages.name: Verification status
stages.description: Bookings waiting for manual verification post proof upload.
events: mPass verification status view details clicked
superPass verification status back btn clicked

stages.name: Booking success
stages.description: Post-checkout confirmation where activation decisions are logged.
events: booking success view booking details clicked

stages.name: Validation
stages.description: BLE/QR validation screen events for activated Super Pass tickets.
events: BLE permission check on validation initialization
BLE validation permission rationale screen opened
BLE validation permission settings screen opened
BLE validation switch to qr got it clicked
BLE validation open qr btn clicked
simple qr validation zoom qr clicked
view trip receipt from menu clicked
exit chalo pay confirmation yes clicked
exit chalo pay confirmation no clicked

stages.name: TITO & BLE Ack
stages.description: TITO tap-in/out validation and BLE acknowledgment events.
events: tito tapIn notif recv on conductor flow
tito tapin polling stopped due to notification received
valid tito tap in data received in polling
invalid tito tap in data received in polling
invalid ble validation ack data received

stages.name: TITO Encryption Keys
stages.description: TITO encryption key fetch events during Super Pass activation.
events: tito encryption keys available on superpass activation
tito encryption keys fetch success on superpass activation
tito encryption keys fetch failed on superpass activation
tito encryption keys not available on superpass activation
tito encryption keys fetch retry clicked on superpass activation
tito encryption keys fetch cancel clicked on superpass activation

stages.name: Home & Navigation
stages.description: Home screen and navigation entry points for Super Pass.
events: home screen super pass your plans clicked
product history screen super pass your plans clicked
bottom sheet dialog fragment super pass open
super pass menu view summary clicked

stages.name: Trip Receipt
stages.description: Super Pass trip receipt viewing and history events.
events: superpass trip receipt history screen opened

stages.name: Global
stages.description: Events that can fire from multiple places, such as report problem.
events: superpass booking flow login exception event
send superpass activation timestamp to backend for visual validation

stages.name: Misc
events: product activation pass punch sync failed
superPass trip receipt history fetch failed
sync mTicket activation timeStamp with backend
sync superPass activation timeStamp with backend

stages.name: Product Selection
events: recent product event in product selection activity

events.name: add photo btn clicked
events.description: Raised when the user taps the Add Photo CTA.

events.name: agency not available for purchase
events.description: Sent when no agency could fulfil the request, immediately navigating back home.

events.name: application submit failure
events.description: The proof submission failed; same metadata helps diagnose reasons.

events.name: application submit success
events.description: Proof submission succeeded; the helper adds configuration metadata for correlation.

events.name: basic user details next clicked
events.description: User submits the detailed form; logs name, dob, gender, pass start date, flow, and isSuperPass flag.

events.name: basic user details screen open
events.description: Detailed user details entry is shown for flows requiring a complete profile.

events.name: booking success back btn clicked
events.description: Back navigation from the booking success screen.

events.name: booking success screen open
events.description: Booking success screen open with source/event flags.

events.name: booking success use later clicked
events.description: User defers activation.

events.name: booking success use now clicked
events.description: User chooses to activate now; includes can activate flag.

events.name: booking success view booking details clicked
events.description: Tap to view booking details.

events.name: camera permission denied dialog displayed
events.source: Either proof fragment depending on which one triggered the dialog.
events.description: Dialog shown when camera permission is denied; logs whether it was dismissed.

events.name: camera permission requested
events.description: The fragment requests camera permission after the upload button is clicked.

events.name: cancel proof image upload clicked
events.description: Cancel button tapped for a specific proof id.

events.name: category selected
events.description: Raised when the user switches the category tab/page in pass selection.

events.name: change pass start date clicked
events.description: Tap on the change start date CTA before the dialog opens.

events.name: confirm payment screen open
events.description: The confirm screen becomes visible for fresh, renewal, or post-verification flows.

events.name: download sample form clicked
events.description: Sample form link clicked from either proof screen; logs the URL plus the default flags.

events.name: edit uploaded proof image clicked
events.description: Edit action re-triggers the picker for the proof id.

events.name: explore available plans clicked
events.description: User navigates to the plan selection flow from the offer sheet.

events.name: mPass cash payment option selected
events.description: Cash payment resolution (success reports reference id, failure reports failure reason).

events.name: mPass confirm purchase pay btn clicked
events.description: Confirm pay tap reuses the configuration metadata for analytics.

events.name: mPass order created
events.description: The backend created an order; logs both order IDs and the configuration metadata.

events.name: mPass order creation failed
events.description: Order creation failure with the reason plus configuration metadata.

events.name: mPass proof submit button clicked
events.description: Proof submission CTA captures configuration metadata via addConfigurationAttributesToEvent.

events.name: mPass verification status activity open
events.description: Verification status screen open event enriched with application metadata.

events.name: mPass verification status ok clicked
events.description: OK button tap with the same pass metadata.

events.name: mPass verification status view details clicked
events.description: Tap on View Details with the same metadata set.

events.name: make payment clicked
events.description: Marks the move into the payment stack with product type/sub type metadata.

events.name: offer availed bottom sheet shown
events.description: Indicates the offer-already-availed state has been shown to the user.

events.name: open super pass cash payment web page
events.description: Logs the cash payment web view navigation along with reference and travel metadata.

events.name: pass start date change CTA clicked
events.description: After the user picks a new start date, logs the revised date, old date, and postponement days.

events.name: photo chooser launched
events.description: Chooses the photo picker after permission is granted.

events.name: product activation pass punch sync failed
proof guidelines btn clicked
events.description: Guidelines link tapped.

events.name: proofs overview screen open
events.description: Proof overview screen open event that automatically appends flow and isSuperPass.

events.name: recent product event in product selection activity
report problem clicked v2
events.description: Raised whenever the user taps the report problem hook; includes the flow token.

events.name: sample proof image zoomed
events.description: Zoomed placeholder image with the URL logged.

events.name: smart passenger selection screen open
events.description: Smart passenger selection screen fires with the list size.

events.name: smartPassengerSelection screen new passenger selected
events.description: User taps the new passenger card; no additional property is emitted.

events.name: smartPassengerSelection screen passenger selected
events.description: Existing passenger selection includes renew flow conversion flag and passenger metadata added via addSuperPassUserDetailsToEvent.

events.name: superPass enter user name next clicked
events.description: Name-only event includes the full name, the source it came from, and flow metadata.

events.name: superPass enter user name screen open
events.description: Name-only or edit flow opens when only the name is needed.

events.name: superPass trip receipt history fetch failed
superPass verification status back btn clicked
events.description: Back navigation from the verification status screen with the same property set.

events.name: superPassPurchase startDestination assigned
events.description: Records which screen the flow started on (confirmation, user details, passenger selection, proof overview, or not available).

events.name: superPassPurchaseActivity open
events.description: Raised when the shared view model finalizes its initial state and announces the purchase flow.
events.notes: sendToPlotline is true for this event.

events.name: sync mTicket activation timeStamp with backend
sync superPass activation timeStamp with backend
upload proof button clicked
events.description: Upload button tapped before permission guard.

events.name: uploaded proof zoomed
events.description: Logs proof zoom and whether it was a rejected image.

events.name: userProofsOverview next clicked
events.description: Next button tapped; helper redundantly adds flow again.

events.name: userProofsOverview reapply clicked
events.description: Reapply CTA tapped.

events.name: watch tutorial video clicked
events.description: Tutorial link clicked with the URL logged.

events.name: ble screen open
events.description: BLE validation screen opened for Super Pass ticket validation.

events.name: qr screen open
events.description: QR validation screen opened for Super Pass ticket validation.

events.name: ble bottom sheet clicked
events.description: User clicked the BLE bottom sheet.

events.name: BLE permission check on validation initialization
events.description: BLE permission check triggered when validation screen initializes.

events.name: BLE permission granted
events.description: User granted BLE permission for ticket validation.

events.name: BLE permission denied
events.description: User denied BLE permission for ticket validation.

events.name: BLE validation help btn clicked
events.description: User clicked the help button on BLE validation screen.

events.name: BLE validation permission rationale screen opened
events.description: BLE permission rationale screen displayed to user.

events.name: BLE validation permission settings screen opened
events.description: User navigated to device settings for BLE permission.

events.name: BLE validation switch to qr got it clicked
events.description: User acknowledged switch to QR validation prompt.

events.name: BLE validation open qr btn clicked
events.description: User clicked to open QR from BLE validation screen.

events.name: simple qr validation zoom qr clicked
events.description: User clicked to zoom QR code on validation screen.

events.name: BLE denial qr option shown
events.description: QR fallback option shown after BLE permission denial.

events.name: BLE permission rationale accepted
events.description: User accepted BLE permission rationale.

events.name: BLE denial use qr clicked
events.description: User chose to use QR after BLE permission denial.

events.name: Post validation screen opened
events.description: Post-validation screen displayed after successful ticket punch.

events.name: view receipt post validation clicked
events.description: User clicked to view receipt from post-validation screen.

events.name: view trip receipt from menu clicked
events.description: User clicked view receipt from validation screen menu.

events.name: exit chalo pay confirmation shown
events.description: Exit confirmation dialog shown when user tries to leave validation.

events.name: exit chalo pay confirmation yes clicked
events.description: User confirmed exit from validation screen.

events.name: exit chalo pay confirmation no clicked
events.description: User cancelled exit from validation screen.

events.name: tito tapIn notif recv on conductor flow
events.description: TITO tap-in notification received during conductor validation flow.

events.name: tito tapin polling stopped due to notification received
events.description: TITO polling stopped because notification was received.

events.name: valid tito tap in data received in polling
events.description: Valid TITO tap-in data received during polling.

events.name: invalid tito tap in data received in polling
events.description: Invalid TITO tap-in data received during polling.

events.name: ble validation ack data consumed
events.description: BLE validation acknowledgment data processed.

events.name: syncing post ble validation failed
events.description: Post-BLE validation sync with backend failed.

events.name: invalid ble validation ack data received
events.description: Invalid BLE validation acknowledgment data received.

events.name: tito encryption keys available on superpass activation
events.description: TITO encryption keys already available when Super Pass is activated.

events.name: tito encryption keys fetch success on superpass activation
events.description: TITO encryption keys fetched successfully during Super Pass activation.

events.name: tito encryption keys fetch failed on superpass activation
events.description: TITO encryption keys fetch failed during Super Pass activation.

events.name: tito encryption keys not available on superpass activation
events.description: TITO encryption keys not available during Super Pass activation.

events.name: tito encryption keys fetch retry clicked on superpass activation
events.description: User clicked retry for TITO encryption keys fetch.

events.name: tito encryption keys fetch cancel clicked on superpass activation
events.description: User cancelled TITO encryption keys fetch.

events.name: home screen super pass your plans clicked
events.description: User clicked Super Pass 'Your Plans' card from home screen.

events.name: product history screen super pass your plans clicked
events.description: User clicked Super Pass 'Your Plans' card from product history screen.

events.name: bottom sheet dialog fragment super pass open
events.description: Super Pass bottom sheet dialog opened.

events.name: super pass menu view summary clicked
events.description: User clicked view summary from Super Pass menu.

events.name: super pass updated
events.description: Super Pass data updated (sync or refresh).

events.name: superpass trip receipt screen opened
events.description: Super Pass trip receipt screen opened.

events.name: superpass trip receipt available
events.description: Trip receipt data available for display.

events.name: superpass trip receipt not available
events.description: Trip receipt data not available.

events.name: superpass trip receipt history screen opened
events.description: Super Pass trip receipt history screen opened.

events.name: superpass trip receipt history displayed
events.description: Trip receipt history data displayed.

events.name: superpass trip receipt clicked
events.description: User clicked on a trip receipt in history.

events.name: superpass booking flow login exception event
events.description: Login exception occurred during Super Pass booking flow.

events.name: superpass activated for visual validation
events.description: Super Pass activated with visual validation enabled.

events.name: send superpass activation timestamp to backend for visual validation
events.description: Super Pass activation timestamp sent to backend for visual validation tracking.

steps.label: Additional events
events: product activation pass punch sync failed
superPass trip receipt history fetch failed
sync mTicket activation timeStamp with backend
sync superPass activation timeStamp with backend

steps.label: Additional events: Product Selection
events: recent product event in product selection activity

diagram.notes: Cash-specific events (open super pass cash payment web page) and passenger/proof subflows sit inside the main steps; report problem clicked v2 and agency not available for purchase represent global/edge paths.
